cast.name: 弗洛林·彼耶尔西克 Florin Piersic
马尔加·巴尔布 Marga Barbu

introduction: Outlaws Series ("Outlaws" - 1965; "Rapture virgins" - 1967 "Revenge outlaws" - 1968;"Haiducii" - 1965; "Răpirea fecioarelor" - 1967; "Răzbunarea haiducilor" - 1968) continues to outlaw Şaptecai triptych of the first episode is this film.To give his daughter, Mr. Ralu (Aimee Iacobescu) desired jewelry, Caragea (Nucu Păunescu) creates a new tax. The famous Anghel Saptecai (Piersic), captain of a band of outlaws burdened peasants rose in defense and starts Thunderbolt and Lightfoot. Urged by his mistress, Anita (Marga Barbu) go to "Stamboul" Anghel falls into a diversion and captured Mamoulos (Choly Rautu), is sent to prison."Cast, vulgar, cheap melodrama Balkan operetta" (Tudor Caranfil).
